attributes.action: A mandatory prison sentence for those who assault emergency service personnel
attributes.additional_details: Emergency service personnel deserve to work in a risk free environment without the fear of been assaulted, Police, Fire, Ambulance and other emergency workers should not be subjected to attacks and the government need to step up to protect them by making it a mandatory prison sentence for those who assault police fire and ambulance staff
attributes.background: We want a mandatory custodial prison sentence for anyone who assaults emergency service personnel

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309432

The Governmetn has also launched a consultation on doubling the maximum penalty for assaults or attacks on emergency workers, which you might like to contribute to:  https://www.gov.uk/government/news/consultation-launched-on-doubling-maximum-sentence-for-assaulting-an-emergency-worker
